properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
TUG NAS PATHFINDER, WHITE AND BLACK HULL,
SEVEN PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
IN VICINITY 45-57.5N 007-41.4W AT 081519Z FEB.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ETEL, TELEX: 42950519,
PHONE: 332 9755 3535, FAX: 332 9755 4934,
E-MAIL: ETEL@MRCCFR.EU.
